text: PHASE 2 (born Lonny Wood; August 2, 1955 - December 13, 2019)George, p10. was an American aerosol artist. He was born in New York City. He was known as member of the Zulu Nation. He was active in the 1970s. Phase 2 was known for creating the "bubble letter" style of graffiti writing. He was also influential in the early hip hop scene. Phase 2 died on December 13, 2019 in New York City from Lou Gehrig's disease-related problems, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== *Adam Mansbach interview with PHASE 2 *"Writer of the Storm", Raw Vision interview with PHASE 2 Category:1955 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:Disease-related deaths in New York City Category:Artists from New York City Category:Graffiti artists
title: PHASE 2
